channel.title: Backup on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Backup on Arrans github.io

item.title: kopia/kopia
item.description: Cross-platform backup tool for Windows, macOS & Linux with fast, incremental backups, client-side end-to-end encryption, compression and data deduplication. CLI and GUI included.

item.title: rustmailer/bichon
item.description: Bichon â€“ A lightweight, high-performance Rust email archiver with WebUI

item.title: rusq/slackdump
item.description: Save or export your private and public Slack messages, threads, files, and users locally without admin privileges.

item.title: duplicati/duplicati
item.description: Store securely encrypted backups in the cloud!

item.title: okhosting/awesome-storage
item.description: A curated list of storage open source tools. Backups, redundancy, sharing, distribution, encryption, etc.

item.title: Tanq16/backhub
item.description: Backhub helps maintain backups of multiple GitHub repos as full local mirrors.

item.title: RealOrangeOne/docker-db-auto-backup
item.description: A script to automatically back up all databases running under docker on a host

item.title: ad-on-is/resticity
item.description: A beautiful cross-platform UI for restic backup.
